hero.description: With a Master's degree and 3 years of professional experience, I specialize in web and mobile development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: With 3 years of experience in a digital services company, I build robust and efficient web, mobile, and desktop applications. I work with modern technologies such as React, Vue.js, Symfony, Next.js, Flutter, Electron, TypeScript, and Python.
